newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech Q1 trade deficit widens to CZK 40.2 bln.
newsitem.headline: Czech Q1 trade deficit widens to CZK 40.2 bln.

text.p: The Czech Republic posted a first quarter trade deficit of 40.181 billion crowns, compared to a 27.112 billion crown deficit for the same period in 1996, the Czech Statistical Bureau (CSU) said on Tuesday.
The CSU said in a statement that March's trade deficit was 13.429 billion crowns and added that it had revised the February deficit to 13.415 billion crowns from a previously reported 13.693 billion.
